EmailTemplate.name: 17.CloudAA.XLE.webXLE.N.G.N.9898.XLE Gamechanger (Refresh).Email 2 - What 50% of
EmailTemplate.subject: What 50% of Forbes global top 50 enterprises already know about Openstack
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> VitalQIP changes the game for your OpenStack enterprise cloud Hi {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
It’s time to cut through the chatter about OpenStack. But how do you decide what the right approach might be?
Our brief, “Top 5 reasons for an OpenStack enterprise cloud with Nokia VitalQIP” summarizes how VitalQIP can change the game for your enterprise OpenStack private cloud.
Find out what half of Forbes global top 50 enterprises already know. To learn more about Nokia IT solutions for large enterprises visit our OpenStack <[[https://networks.nokia.com/solutions/openstack]]> page.
Sincerely,
Michael Williams | Global Enterprise Marketing | Nokia
U.S. and Canada: +1 866-231-0264 (M-F 8:00 a.m. - 5:00 p.m. EST)Europe & Asia Pacific: + 44 203 582 5650 (M-F 8:00a.m.- 4:00p.m. GMT)Or use the How to Buy form <[[https://networks.nokia.com/how-to-buy]]> Connect with us © 2017 Nokia.
